p:
We examined open chromatin peaks flanking the TCF15 and MEOX1 genes within 10 kb. Identified peaks representing candidate CREs were cloned upstream of the herpes simplex virus thymidine kinase (HSV-TK) minimal promoter, driving expression of a stable Citrine reporter
50 . Electroporation targeted the prospective mesoderm of gastrula-stage HH3 + embryos (Supplementary Fig. 5g, h), and reporter gene expression profiles were monitored until HH11.
